text.text_translated:
"Life of Pi" is a book. It tells a very special story. The story is about a boy from India named Pi. His boat sinks in the Pacific Ocean. He is stuck on a small boat with a very wild tiger.

A writer from Canada named Yann Martel wrote the book. It was his third book and it came out in 2001.

The book sold more than seven million copies. It also won many prizes and is now in 41 languages.

Martel's father worked for the government in other countries. So, Martel lived in many places as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.
